data.text: “Dhano ma dhako onywolo ndalone nok
Odongo piyo piyo ka maua bangʼe to oner;
Ngʼat machal kamano bende inyalo dewo?
En ngʼa manyalo kelo gima ler kogolo kuom gima ochido?
Ndalo dhano nosekwan chon;
Omiyo gol wangʼi kuome kendo weye mos,
“Yien ber nyalo bedo gi geno:
Kata obedo ni tiendene towo
to kata kamano, kowinjo much pi,
Dhano to tho kendo iike e bwo lowo;
Mana kaka pi dwono e nam
e kaka dhano nindo piny kendo ok ochak ochungʼ;
“Mad ne ipanda ei liel mondo ne abed maonge nyaka chop mirimbi rum,
Ka ngʼato otho, bende dochak obed mangima kendo?
Ibiro luongo, kendo abiro dwoki;
Eka inikwan kuonde matienda onyono
Kethoga ibiro ket ei ofuku mi din ma ok yawre,
“Mana kaka pi ywero got kendo barore
kendo kaka pi ywero kite kendo koth maduongʼ ywero lowo,
Ihewe dichiel kendo mogik, kendo olal nono;
Kata ka yawuote yudo duongʼ bangʼe,
Gima owinjo en mana rem manie dende owuon
